## The Challenge

In high-variance environments, sensor data arrives in massive, unstructured streams. The lack of governance led to a "Data Swamp" where query costs were spiraling.

## The Architecture

To solve this, I implemented a tiered lineage strategy.

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Raw Sensor Data] -->|Ingest| B(Bronze: Raw)
  B -->|Clean & Tag| C(Silver: Curated)
  C -->|Aggregated Logic| D(Gold: Decision)
